I saw this in a THEATER when it first came out (was attracted to it because it was billed as a Sci-Fi, post-apocolyptic flick--didn't have a clue at the time who Pamela Anderson was).  Didn't last more than 8 or 10 days.  As I recall the plot had some similarities to the fictional backdrop of the Dark Angel series.  To my mind, the only thing that "rocked" was Pamela's rack.  The plot and her acting were, shall we say, forgettable.  Prefer my manes brunette, smaller bumpy bits, and some acting ability--such as what you get with Keira Knightley or Rachel Weisz.  Giving it a shot anyhow.  Thanks for your nightly encodes, 20-40.  (Finally finished the JDownload, btw, and again, thanks.)
